channel.title: Posts on Noah's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Noah's Blog

item.description: Starting Out 23/01/20 Well, after a long week and a half, I finally have this blog up and running. Hopefully. I'm not entirely sure if this will work, but I'm remaining optimistic, as I have for the past 10 days or so. This blog is hosted by Github Pages, and through using them I realized I had forgotten practically everything I had ever known about git. It took me almost an entire day, but I relearned some git commands, including, but not limited to:
